data.text: O! Yehowa, mègaka mo nam le wò dziku me,
elabena wò aŋutrɔwo ƒo ɖem,
Wò dziku helĩhelĩ la wɔe be ŋusẽ aɖeke megale menye o;
Nye dzidada kɔ gbɔ tanye abe agba kpekpe si
Nye abiwo ƒaƒã hele ʋeʋẽm
Wobɔbɔm ɖe anyi, eye woɖi gbɔ̃m,
Vevesese manyagblɔ aɖe xɔ nye ame blibo la me,
Megbɔdzɔ, hegba gudugudu,
O! Aƒetɔ, nye dzimedidiwo katã le ŋkuwò me,
Nye dzi le tsotsom kpokpokpo,
Le nye abiawo ta,
Ame siwo le nye agbe yome tim la tre mɔ nam,
Mele abe tokunɔ si mate ŋu ase nu o la ene,
Mele abe ame si mesea nu o la ene
O! Yehowa, mele asiwò nu kpɔm,
Elabena megblɔ be, “Mègana be woakpɔ dziɖuɖu ƒe dzidzɔ ɖe ŋutinye,
Esusɔ vie ko madze anyi,
Meʋu nye dzidada me,
Ame geɖewoe nye nye futɔ gãwo,
Ame siwo tsɔ vɔ̃ ɖo nyui siwo mewɔ teƒe la
O! Yehowa, mègagblẽm ɖi o,
Va kaba, nàɖem,
